00028 
00029 #ifndef SOLAREGULATORMAIN_H
00030 #define SOLAREGULATORMAIN_H
00031 
00032 /*****************************************************************************/
00033 /* System Configuration Information */
00034 
00035 /* These must be defined here to set baudrate otherwise we can't communicate
00036 */
00037 #ifndef F_CPU               /* CPU speed in Hz */
00038 #define F_CPU               8000000
00039 #endif
00040 #define UART_BAUD_RATE      38400
00041 
00042 /* This sets a size for the input and output command buffers, limiting the
00043 length of packets sent and received */
00044 #define DATA_BUFFER_SIZE    16
00045 
00046 /* ADC_CAPABLE defines the existence of 1 and 2 Analogue channels */
00047 #define ADC_CAPABLE_1       1
00048 #define ADC_CAPABLE_2       1
00049 
00050 /* ADC capability - use interrupts but not sleep or freerun mode */
00051 #define ADC_MODE            2
00052 #define ADC_SPEED           200
00053 #define TWI_SPEED           100
00054 
00055 /* Most of the following are defaults */
00056 /* 0.128ms clock for 8MHz clock and value 5 (gives scale 1024, see timer.c)
00057 This gives a 32ms overflow interrupt.*/
00058 #define RTC_SCALE           5
00059 
00060 /* External EEPROM information */
00061 #define LOCAL_EEPROM_DEVICE 0xA0
00062 #define EEPROM_END          0xFFFF
00063 
00064 /* Internal EEPROM start address for Information Block */
00065 #define INF_BLOCK_START     0
00066 
00067 /* Start of data buffer in external EEPROM following channel information.*/
00068 #define BUFFER_START        0x10
00069 
00070 /* Size of a data block written to the external EEPROM. Keep as a power of two. */
00071 #define DATA_BLOCK_SIZE    16
00072 
00073 /* Location of the bootloader. We don't use this. A watchdog reset is used to
00074 force the MCU to reset and hence jump to the bootloader (if the fuses are
00075 set correctly). */
00076 #define BOOTLOADER          0x1C00
00077 
00078 /*****************************************************************************/
00079 /* States of the packet I/O state machines */
00080 #define IDLE 0x0
00081 #define SYNC 0x1
00082 #define ADDRESS 0x2
00083 #define NUMBER_BYTES 0x3
00084 #define COMMAND 0x4
00085 #define DATA_PHASE 0x5
00086 #define CHECKSUM 0x6
00087 #define EOM 0x7
00088 
00089 /* Control Characters */
00090 #define IDLE_CHAR 0xDD
00091 #define SYNC_CHAR 0x67
00092 #define EOM_CHAR 0x03
00093 
00094 /* Commands */
00095 #define NO_COMMAND 0x0
00096 #define RESET 0x0
00097 #define UNIT_INF_ACCESS 0x01
00098 #define READ_MEMORY 0x02
00099 #define WRITE_MEMORY 0x03
00100 #define READ_EEPROM 0x04
00101 #define WRITE_EEPROM 0x05
00102 #define RESET_BUFFER_POINTERS 0x06
00103 #define RESET_CLOCK 0x07
00104 #define ERROR_COMMAND 0x10
00105 #define SUCCESS_COMMAND 0x11
00106 #define OFFSET_CALIBRATE 0x20
00107 #define ADC_ONCE 0x21
00108 #define ADC_MULTIPLE 0x22
00109 #define SET_CHANNEL_CONTROL 0x23
00110 #define ADC_ABORT 0x24
00111 #define STATE_VARIABLES 0x25
00112 #define BOOTLOADER_JUMP 0x40
00113 #define READ_SRAM 0x42
00114 #define WRITE_SRAM 0x43
00115 #define SET_PORT_BIT 0x44
00116 #define CLEAR_PORT_BIT 0x45
00117 #define READ_PORT 0x46
00118 
00119 /* Error Codes */
00120 #define NO_ERROR 0x0
00121 #define COMMAND_SYNTAX 0x1
00122 #define UNKNOWN_COMMAND 0x2
00123 #define PACKET_SEQUENCE_ERROR 0x3
00124 #define READ_MEMORY_SYNTAX 0x10
00125 #define WRITE_MEMORY_SYNTAX 0x11
00126 #define READ_EEPROM_SYNTAX 0x12
00127 #define WRITE_EEPROM_SYNTAX 0x13
00128 #define READ_EEPROM_FAIL 0x14
00129 #define WRITE_EEPROM_FAIL 0x15
00130 #define ADC_SYNTAX 0x16
00131 #define ADC_FAILURE 0x17
00132 #define RESET_BUFFER_POINTERS_SYNTAX 0x18
00133 #define RESET_CLOCK_SYNTAX 0x19
00134 #define UNIT_INF_ACCESS_SYNTAX 0x1A
00135 #define SET_CHANNEL_CONTROL_SYNTAX 0x1B
00136 #define BOOT_SYNTAX 0x1C
00137 #define ADC_RESTART_ATTEMPT 0x1D
00138 #define ADC_PARAMETERS 0x1E
00139 #define STATE_VARIABLE_SYNTAX 0x1F
00140 #define READ_SRAM_SYNTAX 0x40
00141 #define SET_PORT_SYNTAX 0x41
00142 #define CLEAR_PORT_SYNTAX 0x42
00143 #define READ_PORT_SYNTAX 0x43
00144 #define NO_PORT 0x44
00145 
00146 /* Baudrate settings */
00147 #define BAUDRATE UART_BAUD_SELECT(UART_BAUD_RATE,F_CPU)
00148 
00149 /*****************************************************************************/
00150 
00151 /* Prototypes for tasks */
00152 
00153 /* This task sets up the main tasks by initializing the EEPROM storage. When ready
00154 it initiates the tasks to run regularly and check the battery voltage.*/
00155 void initiateControlTask(void)  __attribute__ ((naked));
00156 /* This task measures the voltages and currents from the A/D converters, and
00157 scales them according to the calibrated values in the internal EEPROM block.*/
00158 void measurementTask(void)      __attribute__ ((naked));
00159 /* This task runs the main control of the Regulator. Sample data is stored to EEPROM
00160 at intervals.*/
00161 void controlTask(void)          __attribute__ ((naked));
00162 /* This task tests for user input via a hardware push button and manages the display
00163 of system variables and configuration of certain items.*/
00164 void displayTask(void)          __attribute__ ((naked));
00165 /* Communications Tasks */
00166 void processError(void)         __attribute__ ((naked));
00167 void processCommand(void)       __attribute__ ((naked));
00168 void inputPacketReceive(void)   __attribute__ ((naked));
00169 void outputPacketSend(void)     __attribute__ ((naked));
00170 
00171 /* Prototypes for local functions */
00172 long rescale(const int voltage,const int multiplier,const int offset);
00173 void display(const long value);
00174 void setErrorCode(const unsigned int code);
00175 
00176 /* Prototypes for local hardware functions */
00177 void configurePorts(void);
00178 void openPanel(void);
00179 void shortPanel(void);
00180 void connectLoad(void);
00181 void isolateLoad(void);
00182 void onLED(void);
00183 void offLED(void);
00184 
00185 /* General Functions */
00186 
00187 inline int abs(int value)
00188 {
00189   if (value < 0) return -value;
00190   else return value;
00191 }
00192
